popularityCurve.label: the restaurant's owners hired andersen consulting to revamp all our processes after several months of analysis they concluded that the spoon was the most frequently dropped piece of cutlery it represents a drop frequency of approximately 3 spoons per table per hour if our staff are better prepared we can reduce the number of trips back to the kitchen and save 15 man-hours per shift
